Package com.lonepulse.robozombie.util

Contains a set of utility classes which isolate common and trivial tasks.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Fields.Criterion This contract defines a strategy for filtering the Fields within an instance of Fields by evaluating each Field to determine if it should be included in the filtered result.
 

Class Summary
Assert A collection of utility services which eases certain trivial validations.
Components A collection of utility services for processing components attached to an endpoint contract.
Entities A collection of utility services for translating and managing HttpEntity instances.
Fields Fluent filtering for a collection of Fields.
Is A collection of utility services for common conditional checks.
Metadata A collection of generic utility services which enables the discovery of metadata on endpoint and request definitions.
 

Exception Summary
EntityResolutionFailedException This runtime exception is thrown when a specific HttpEntity implementation failed to be resolved for a generic object or Class.
 

Package com.lonepulse.robozombie.util Description

Contains a set of utility classes which isolate common and trivial tasks.

Since:
1.1.0

Author:
Lahiru Sahan Jayasinghe
